Pair your device with 2 computers with the same name or "Accessory".
No two devices with the same name appear?
Please check if your device is Bluetooth 5.0 and supports BLE protocol from" Device Manager" > "Bluetooth".
(We recommend that you use a Bluetooth device that meets the above requirements.)
Turn off Bluetooth and try again.
You are not logged in, please log in your VIP account to use multi-device screen mirroring.
For VIP only, upgrade to mirror multiple devices simultaneously.
Tap "Don't show again", then it will not prompt again.
To use the USB connection, please refer to the following solutions:
Continue USB mirroring, but iTunes service is not available during this period.
Unplug the USB cable and choose WiFi connection instead of USB.
Use the driver repair tool and reboot your PC to reconnect.
Manually uninstall the iTunes driver on PC and restart the app to reconnect.
Free trial can connect 10 mins at a time
Upgrade to premium to enjoy more
Auto connect when only 1 device is connected
It detected that your device does not meet the requirements, please try again after updating.
Go to "Settings > Bluetooth", pair your device with 2 computers with the same name displayed as "DESKTOP-CHILOHEF8F" or "Accessory".
If it doesn't work, please tap "Forget this device" and connect again.
If it still doesn't work or you're not sure whether BLE 5.0 is supported, please #view guide# or #contact us#.
Go to "Settings > Accessibility > Touch > AssistiveTouch", then turn on AssistiveTouch. Otherwise the mouse will not be able to click.
Press "#ALT+C#" to make clicks more accurate. Press "#ALT+Q#" to exit. You can also double click to customize your shortcuts in "Shortcuts settings" on PC.
If it still doesn't work, please #view guide# or #contact us#.
Click to control iOS, press ALT+C to make clicks more accurate
Press ALT+Q to exit and show mouse
Professional Software Development Kit for Multi-screen Interaction

LetsView SDK is a complete set of multi-screen interaction application development kit, including sender and receiver, compatible with massive screen mirroring protocols and adaptable to various systems. A customizable development interface and complete technical documentation and Demo can be provided. LetsView has been deeply involved in multi-screen interaction for decades, and it's the best solution for you to invoke and integrate screen mirroring services quickly.
ApowerMirror technical services are provided by LetsView SDK
LetsViewSDK is compatible with a variety of protocols and platforms
* ApowerMirror account can be used on phone, computer and TV. The membership purchased on one platform is shared with two others.

Tips: Press Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V to copy & paste the PC content directly to the phone.
Tips: Change the display quality in "General settings".
Tips: To record the sound of the PC and phone, select "System sound" under "Audio input".
Tips: To record your voice through microphone, select "Microphone" under "Audio input".
Tips: To find the recorded files, go to "Output directory" under "Capturing settings".
Tips: Don't forget to share this great app to your friends!
Tips: ApowerMirror requires your Android system is 5.0 or higher.
Tips: ApowerMirror is compatible with iOS devices running iOS 8 or higher.
Tips: Change the video format before recording in "Capturing settings".
Tips: Adjust the video quality before recording in "Capturing settings".
Tips: Once "Control from PC" mode is enabled, use computer keyboard to type messages.
Tips: Press Ctrl+Q to take screenshots conveniently.
Tips: Press Ctrl+R to record phone screen easily.
Tips: Press Ctrl and +/- simultaneously to adjust the volume.

A set of keyboard settings for this game is available, do you want to download?
Drag to target area and edit key mapping, then you can tap the key to take action.
Drag to direction control area, then you can tap the key to move.
Adjust circle size to fit effective range.
Drag to aiming area of shooting games to use the mouse to control the vision; Right-click the mouse to control the vision by default.
If it conflicts with the joystick, please move the aiming button to a clear area of the screen on the right side.
Drag to fire button of shooting games. Left-click the mouse to fire.
Tap * button to edit the game keys

You didn't turn on the Bluetooth on PC and phone. Turn on it to control your phone
My desktop didn't come with the Bluetooth

Open "Settings"-"Accessibility"-"Touch"-Enable "AssistiveTouch" (iPhone quick ball). Turn on Bluetooth of iPhone，you can see two options with the same name:【#Computer#】or【Accessory】. Connect the two【Accessory】or two computer devices name to PC, and you will see the mouse pointer appear on the phone screen. Now you can control iPhone from PC.
